name: 101_4 Nodes, Paths & Instancing (i)
description:
Single-Play Workbox from GDScript Basics App, a simple GDScript Basics learning app and cheat-sheet.

Workbox:
In this workbox we cover the basics of Nodes, Node Paths and Instancing in GDScript, the scripting language used in Godot. 

Device:
PC: Win64, Linux64
Web: WASM

Updates:
[10-14-21]
'Timed-Run" Mechanic
Drag and Drop answer mechanic.

[In Development] [Known Bugs = *]
Cheat-Sheet content and UI re-design.
*Fix 'Sticky' text box drop-release issue
* On Screen-Stretch, Answer Box Area screen position unreliable.  If you're having issues try using the app in full-screen.
*Answer Box Area in use function unreliable. Resulting in drag-drop misplacement and 'sticky' moments.
*Press-Enter to submit answer mechanic unreliable when mixed with physical button use.

This project is in the prototyping phase. Please forgive any bugs or mistakes you encounter, and feel free to share your notes, bugs, comments.
